HEADING: Delete Tenant
CONFIRM_HEADING: Are you sure you want to delete <%= targetTenant.name %>?
MESSAGE_SUCCESS: Success! The following information has been deleted:
ERROR_INVALID_CSRF: Invalid security token. Please go back, refresh, and try again.
ERROR_GENERIC: An error occurred. Please reach out to support or try again later.
WARNING_DELETE_CURRENT_USER: This will delete this user (<%= user.username %>) and log you out!
MESSAGE_TENANT_DELETED: This tenant has been deleted you have been logged out. Thanks for being a FastComments customer!
MESSAGE_TENANT_DELETED_OTHER: <%= targetTenant.name %> has been deleted. Thanks for being a FastComments customer!
CHECKBOX_CONFIRM: I'm sure I want to delete the tenant called "<%= targetTenant.name %>" with the ID: "<%= targetTenant._id %>".
